      • normConfidence

        protected static int normConfidence(int s)
        Produces a value between 0 and 100 by taking the not properly normalized confidence in the expected range of 0 to 175. This function is optimized to deal with acceptable matches being above 80, good matches above 90 and very good matches incl and above 100. The maximum of 100 is reached for an input of 175 or above.
